channel.title: How to add members items what members can only wear?
channel.description:
Hello , i was interesting, how can i add an items what MEMBERS can only wear ? I didint find anywhere the tutorial so im Confused. i tryed to make something up myself, but camed errors :/ Anyways i hope sum1 will help me out :)
-Maffiaest

look at it and learn how requirements work
and make 1 for members
inside the public int getMembReq(wearID){

if(id == XXXX || id == XXX){//member weapons return 2; }else return 2;
GL
